state_summary: Pangyo Techno Valley, South Korea's Silicon Valley equivalent, has over 1,800 startups, research centers, and global tech firms, but its influence wanes compared to Seoul's Gangnam district.
evidence: Pangyo Techno Valley is home to more than 1,800 startups, research centers, and global tech firms
91.5% of companies in Pangyo are small and midsize businesses, with only 3.6% being Big Tech
Many Korean founders struggle to turn failure into opportunity and lack a clear, authentic narrative about their business
